nodes.text: Star Wars Helmet Collection 6 is the sixth issue of Star Wars Helmet Collection, published by De Agostini. The issue includes a 1:5 scale replica helmet of a TIE fighter pilot.

On page 9, it states species are "various, mostly human", implying the existence of non-human TIE fighter pilots. However, this conflicts with both Ultimate Star Wars and Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition, which just say "human". As Star Wars Helmet Collection magazines do not explicitly credit the Lucasfilm Story Group, then information from Ultimate Star Wars and Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition, which both have Story Group credits, take precedence.
